briefdescription.para: Report KV hit to instrumentation layers.
Report KV miss to instrumentation layers.
Align x up to a (power-of-two).
Ceiling division for size_t.

memberdef.argsstring: (size_t t, size_t h, size_t g, size_t H, size_t G)
memberdef.name: param_index

briefdescription.para: Compute parameter index for INT8 affine params.
Check for multiplication overflow (size_t).

simplesect.para: 0 on success; non-zero on overflow or bad args.

memberdef.argsstring: (size_t a, size_t b, size_t c, size_t *out)
memberdef.name: mul3_overflow_sz

briefdescription.para: Check for 3-way multiplication overflow (size_t).

simplesect.para: 0 on success; non-zero on overflow or bad args.

briefdescription.para: Validate options and populate derived fields in kv (no allocation).

detaileddescription.para:
This populates:
heads/head_dim/max_seq/storage/symmetric/fp8_format
group_size/group_count (INT8 only)
elem_count = heads * max_seq * head_dim
Pointers are cleared and ownership fields are reset.

simplesect.para: 0 on success; non-zero on invalid options.

briefdescription.para: Compute the backing slab size required for one cache given derived fields.

detaileddescription.para:
The slab contains, in order (with 64-byte alignment between segments):
K payload
V payload
INT8 params (scales_K, zeros_K, scales_V, zeros_V) if needed
scratch buffers (INT8 per-group scratch, FP8 scratch) if needed

parameterdescription.para: Derived cache fields (must have elem_count/group_count set).

briefdescription.para: Slice a backing slab into pointers inside kv.

parameterdescription.para: Cache to populate (must have derived fields set).

simplesect.para: 0 on success; non-zero on bounds/overflow error.

briefdescription.para: Return the element size for a KV storage type.

detaileddescription.para: Return element size in bytes for a given storage encoding.

simplesect.para: Element size in bytes; 0 for unknown.

briefdescription.para: Initialize a single KV cache and allocate its backing memory.

detaileddescription.para: Initialize a single KV cache, allocating its backing memory.

parameterdescription.para: Options describing cache geometry and storage format.

briefdescription.para: Initialize an array of KV cache layers backed by one contiguous slab.

detaileddescription.para: Initialize an array of KV caches (one per layer) using one shared slab.

This allocates a single slab large enough for n_layers caches and then assigns each cache view to its slice. The first layer is marked as the owner of the slab and will free it when ie_kv_free_layers() is called.

parameterdescription.para: Cache options applied to every layer.

briefdescription.para: Free a single KV cache.

detaileddescription.para: Free a KV cache and release its backing memory if owned.
Only the cache marked as owner frees the shared slab. After freeing, the structure is zeroed to prevent accidental reuse.

briefdescription.para: Free a layered KV cache allocation.

detaileddescription.para: Convenience to free an array of KV caches created by ie_kv_init_layers().
Freeing the owner (layer 0) is sufficient; other layers are cleared.

memberdef.argsstring: (ie_kv_cache *kv, size_t t, const float *K_f32, const float *V_f32)
memberdef.name: ie_kv_store_token_f32

briefdescription.para: Store one token's K/V into an F32 KV cache.

detaileddescription.para: Store a token's K/V slice into an FP32 cache.

memberdef.argsstring: (ie_kv_cache *kv, size_t t, const float *K_f32, const float *V_f32)
memberdef.name: ie_kv_store_token_int8_per_tensor

briefdescription.para: Store one token's K/V into an INT8 KV cache using per-tensor params per head.

detaileddescription.para: Store a token's K/V slice into an INT8 cache using per-tensor params.

Computes a single affine scale/zero for each (token, head) using min/max over the whole head_dim, then quantizes all D values. The same parameters are replicated into every group slot to keep the load path consistent.

memberdef.argsstring: (ie_kv_cache *kv, size_t t, const float *K_f32, const float *V_f32)
memberdef.name: ie_kv_store_token_int8_per_group

briefdescription.para: Store one token's K/V into an INT8 KV cache using per-group params.

detaileddescription.para: Store a token's K/V slice into an INT8 cache using per-group params.
Computes affine scale/zero per group of size group_size along head_dim and stores those parameters into (token, head, group). Quantization is applied group-wise to the payload.

memberdef.argsstring: (ie_kv_cache *kv, size_t t, const float *K_f32, const float *V_f32)
memberdef.name: ie_kv_store_token_fp8

briefdescription.para: Store one token's K/V into an FP8 KV cache.

detaileddescription.para: Store a token's K/V slice into an FP8 cache.
Quantizes activations to FP8 using the configured fp8_format and stores the packed bytes into the cache. Uses a per-head scratch buffer of length head_dim.

briefdescription.para: Load one token's K/V into float buffers.

detaileddescription.para: Load token t as FP32 K/V slices from any storage encoding.
Performs dequantization for INT8/FP8 caches. On success, reports a KV hit. If t is out of range, reports a KV miss and returns an error.

briefdescription.para: Return raw pointers to the K and V payload buffers.

detaileddescription.para: Get raw payload pointers and leading dimension for [t][h][d] layout.
This is intended for debug/interop. The returned pointers reference internal cache storage and remain valid until the cache is freed.

parameterdescription.para: Output pointer for K base address (optional).
Output pointer for V base address (optional).

briefdescription.para: Return element strides for the cache layout.

detaileddescription.para: Get logical strides (in elements) for the [t][h][d] layout.

Strides are returned in units of elements of the underlying storage type (not bytes). The layout is:
d stride = 1
h stride = head_dim
t stride = heads * head_dim

briefdescription.para: Implementation of a compact Key/Value attention cache with INT8/FP8 compression.

detaileddescription.para: The cache stores per-token K/V slices laid out as [heads, head_dim] per token, flattened with head_dim as the fastest-varying dimension:
index(t,h,d) = ((t * H + h) * D + d)
For INT8 storage, per-group affine parameters are kept for each (token, head). The parameter array index is:
param_index(t,h,g) = ((t * H + h) * G + g)
where G = ceil(D / group_size).

Layered KV specification:
Transformer inference uses an array of caches, one per layer.
This module can allocate a single contiguous backing slab for all layers and slice it into per-layer cache views via ie_kv_init_layers().

Instrumentation:
This module can optionally report "KV hits" and "KV misses".
If the metrics layer exposes IE_KV_HIT / IE_KV_MISS macros, they are invoked.
In all builds, we also update the lightweight counters in ie_kv_instrumentation.h.
